column1: #Text=Korra says : " Tenzin , please , do n't send me back home . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " You blatantly disobeyed my wishes and the orders of the White Lotus . "
#Text=Korra says : " Katara agreed with me that I should come .
#Text=" Korra says : " Look , I ca n't wait any longer to finish my training .
#Text=Being cooped up and hidden away from the world is n't helping me become a better Avatar .
#Text=I saw a lot of the city today , and it 's totally out of whack .
#Text=I understand now why you need to stay .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You ... ah ... " Ruffled police officer says : " Is this your polar bear dog , miss ?
